scripts.network: hc s clean && npm run build:happ && npm run build -w @neighbourhoods/nh-we-applet && concurrently "npm run build:watch -w we" "npm run launch:happ"
scripts.start:agent: cross-env RUST_LOG=warn HC_PORT=$(port) ADMIN_PORT=$(port) concurrently "npm run playground" "sleep 30 && npm run install:devhub" "npm run start:happ" "npm run start -w we"
scripts.launch:happ: RUST_LOG=warn echo "pass" | hc launch --piped -n $AGENTS ./workdir/we.happ -w --ui-path ui/app/dist network mdns
scripts.start:happ: RUST_LOG=warn WASM_LOG=debug echo "pass" | hc s --piped -f=$ADMIN_PORT generate ./workdir/we.happ --run=$HC_PORT -a we network mdns
scripts.package: npm run build:happ && npm run package -w we && hc web-app pack workdir
scripts.build:happ: npm run download-sensemaker && npm run build:dnas && hc app pack ./workdir
scripts.build:dnas: npm run build:zomes && hc dna pack ./dnas/we/workdir && hc dna pack ./dnas/lobby/workdir
scripts.install:devhub: hc s call -r=$ADMIN_PORT install-app-bundle --app-id DevHub ./DevHub/DevHub.happ && npm run devhub:ui
scripts.prepare: rimraf DevHub && curl -L --output DevHub.webhapp https://drive.switch.ch/index.php/s/bFlG9VjNcjfa1D8/download && hc web-app unpack DevHub.webhapp && extract-zip web_assets.zip ./DevHub/ui && rimraf web_assets.zip DevHub.webhapp
